thread.title: AVIS Fleet to Service Fiji International
thread.title_full: AVIS Fleet to Service Fiji International

author: Deep
title: AVIS Fleet to Service Fiji International
text:
Home » GLOBAL TRAVEL NEWS » AVIS Fleet to Service Fiji International AVIS Fleet to Service Fiji International   
AVIS and the Fiji International have signed another year’s partnership for AVIS to be the Official Car Rental Sponsor of the International professional golf tournament to be hosted at Natadola Bay Championship Golf Course from October 15 – 18 this year. The signing comes less than a week following the announcement of top twenty United States golf star, Matt Kuchar, confirming his participation in the Fiji International 2015. 

“AVIS Fiji has enjoyed a great relationship with the Fiji International since its inaugural event in 2014. We feel the Fiji International provides AVIS not only with an opportunity to be associated to the nation’s biggest sporting event but also a fantastic platform for international and domestic brand exposure.” commented Jai Kumar, Asco Motors Fiji – Chief Executive Officer. 


“AVIS has a big roster of sports relationships and our continued partnership with the Fiji international highlights the importance of the sport and the incremental value we receive reaching its loyal fan base”, added Jai Kumar. 


Matt Porm, Head of Commercial for the Fiji International, said, “We are extremely pleased to know that our association with AVIS will continue for another year. AVIS has been a great partner in providing the Fiji International with our fleet of vehicles as well as facilitating preferred rates for our participating golf professionals, volunteers and other members.” Matt adds, “AVIS has been a generous supporter of the tournament and has played a role in raising the event’s stature to the high level the Fiji International golf tournament enjoys today.”
